definition: Study Times, journal of the Central Party School 中央黨校|中央党校[Zhong1 yang1 Dang3 xiao4]
Global Times (weekly digest of international news from People's Daily 人民日報|人民日报[Ren2 min2 Ri4 bao4])
Financial Times stock exchange index (FTSE 100 or footsie)
pinyin: Jin1 rong2 Shi2 bao4 zhi3 shu4

sentences.english: We definitely appreciate the direction that the NYT is taking.
sentences.chinese: 我們絕對讚賞紐約時報的這一發展方向。

sentences.english: It was one of the best-sellers on the list of the New York Times.
sentences.chinese: 這本書被紐約時報列爲最暢銷書之一。

sentences.english: I write op-eds for GT's English edition (and China Daily).
sentences.chinese: 我給《環球時報》的英文版以及中國日報的專欄寫稿。

sentences.english: TOI wants to keep readers amused and not to worry about the dirt.
sentences.chinese: 印度時報想要保持娛樂讀者，並不擔心污垢。

sentences.english: Herbert will get half the cash, according to The Times of London.
sentences.chinese: 赫伯特將得到這筆現金的一半，據倫敦時報報導。

sentences.english: British "Financial Times" reported that the micro-Bo has become the fastest growing source of news.
sentences.chinese: 英國《金融時報》報道說，微博成了最快的新聞來源。

sentences.english: The news sent investors scurrying in after-hours trading, according to the New York Times
sentences.chinese: 據紐約時報報道，消息發佈在投資者收市後。

sentences.english: "…" By the Center for Allais way for the Los Angeles Times.
sentences.chinese: 通過阿萊道森特向洛杉磯時報。

sentences.english: Perrett spoke with The Times about his work.
sentences.chinese: Perrett對洛杉磯時報記者談到他的研究工作。

sentences.english: And the New York Times said that Dewey would win the election by a large majority.
sentences.chinese: 紐約時報也認爲杜爲將會以絕對優勢贏得選舉。

sentences.english: Here the New York Times curates its readers' debate.
sentences.chinese: 該欄目中紐約時報爲讀者的爭論充當牧師角色。

sentences.english: In his Times piece, Buffett felt free to speak for his fellow rich.
sentences.chinese: 在紐約時報上，巴菲特毫不拘束地代表富人們講話。

sentences.english: Also fluid intake and urine output is often recorded and should be noted and reported on rounds.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還應記錄攝人液體量及尿量以便在查房時報告。

sentences.english: Bittman took a circuitous path to his job at the Times.
sentences.chinese: 比特曼採取了迂迴的路徑，他的工作在“紐約時報”。

sentences.english: Staff of the Beijing bureau of The New York Times contributed research.
sentences.chinese: 紐約時報北京局的員工貢獻資料。

sentences.english: The online version of The Times should remain completely free.
sentences.chinese: 在線版的《時報》應該保持完全免費。

definition: specially engaged/employed or commissioned for a special task
books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
Sing Tao, Hong Kong media group and publisher of Sing Tao Daily 星島日報|星岛日报
